PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_PatchCordCable
PropertySetDef.Definition: This property set has properties that are applicable to cable segment and optical cable segment, indicated that the cable is a patch cord cable, which is fitted with connectors at both ends, allowing it to be rapidly and conveniently connected to other cables or to distribution panels.

PropertyDef.Name: JacketColour
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the colour of the cable or fitting jacket.
